com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class ObjectGraphNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.AbstractTreeNode
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.ObjectGraphNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TreeNode, Serializable

    public final class ObjectGraphNode
extends AbstractTreeNode
    Stores information about a node in a java object graph.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObjectGraphNode

        public ObjectGraphNode(int id,
               String fieldName,
               String type,
               Object value)
        Creates an ObjectGraphNode.
        Parameters:
        id - the node id.
        fieldName - the field name that the parent node refers to this node by.
        type - the fully qualified java type name.
        value - the node value.

    • Method Detail

      • isPrimitive

        public boolean isPrimitive()
        Returns:
        true if those node represents a primitive type.

      • isSimpleType

        public boolean isSimpleType()
        Returns:
        true if those node represents a "simple" type.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the sum of the size of primitive/simple value data contained within this node. This will differ from the serialized size, as references to shared objects aren't followed/counted.
        Returns:
        the actual data size, in bytes.

      • toFlatSummary

        public String toFlatSummary()
        Returns:
        a flat format summary representation of the object tree, starting at this node.

      • toXml

        public String toXml()
        Returns:
        an XML representation of the object tree, starting at this node.

      • getFieldName

        public String getFieldName()
        Returns:
        Returns the fieldName.

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        Returns the id.

      • getRefNode

        public ObjectGraphNode getRefNode()
        Returns:
        Returns the refNode.

      • getType

        public String getType()
        Returns:
        Returns the type.

      • getValue

        public Object getValue()
        Returns:
        Returns the value.

      • setRefNode

        public void setRefNode(ObjectGraphNode refNode)
        Parameters:
        refNode - The refNode to set.

      • setSize

        protected void setSize(int size)
        Sets the node size. Allows ObjectGraphDump to adjust the overhead size of e.g. collections classes.
        Parameters:
        size - the new node size.
